directions: Stir water gradually into Gravy Mix with whisk in small saucepan.
Stirring frequently, cook on medium heat until gravy comes to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 3 to 4 minutes. (Gravy will thicken upon standing).
ingredients: 1 (.88 ounce) package McCormick® Gluten-Free Turkey Gravy Mix
title: Turkey Gravy from McCormick®
